title: Out
subtle: Concept (fiction), 32 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR20L
description: Unlike the monkey from the book In, the little dog loves to leap out of things, including cars, wagons, and the bathtub. Students will enjoy the dynamic action in this text while they practice high-frequency words and learn new vocabulary.
reviewWords: bathtub, boat, car, grass, house, mud, out, wagon, water
comprehension: Sequence Events                : Learn to sequence events in a story
phonics: Consonants : Associate the letter Ww with the /w/ sound
